mapper.insert: insert into board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter, filedata) values(#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, #{filedata})
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwritedt, bcount, bwriter, filedata from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, bupdatedt = now() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwritedt, bcount, bwriter from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwritedt, bcount, bwriter from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc limit #{page}, 10
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwritedt, bcount, bwriter, rcount from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, bwritedt desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
